source: TEXT_HEAVNZ810_01940_SEQ_00<tab>Halfsix seems to be giggling to himself.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ810_01940_SEQ_00<tab>イディルシャイアのハーフシクスは、いたずらを企んでいる。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ810_01940_SEQ_01<tab>Halfsix has seemingly crafted devices able to interrupt Illuminati communications. Now, he wishes you to plant these contraptions around the Makers' Quarter, so as to vex the mortal enemies of Idyllshire. Make your way to the Dravanian hinterlands, and set up the three jamming devices now.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ810_01940_SEQ_01<tab>ハーフシクスから、「青の手」がうろつく場所に、<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8B3001 /var>の設置を頼まれた。低地ドラヴァニアのシャーレアン工匠街で、「<var 28 ((EObj)) F61E9B7201 /var>」に、「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8B3001 /var>」を3個設置しよう。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ810_01940_SEQ_02<tab>You plant all three jamming devices in a crescent pattern around the Arkhitekton. Report back to Halfsix, and tell him the great “joke” you two have played on Illuminati.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ810_01940_SEQ_02<tab><var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8B3001 /var>を設置した。イディルシャイアの「ハーフシクス」に報告しよう。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ810_01940_SEQ_03<tab>Upon hearing that the deed is done, Halfsix must stifle his own laughter when imagining exactly how frustrating it will be for the Illuminati to lose their ability to communicate. Though he does not thank you in so many words, you sense you have won the goblin's trust.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ810_01940_SEQ_03<tab>ハーフシクスに報告した。設置した<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8B3001 /var>で、「青の手」の通信を妨害するいたずらを仕掛け、ハーフシクスはほくそ笑むのだった。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ810_01940_TODO_00<tab>Plant jamming devices throughout the Makers' Quarter.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ810_01940_TODO_00<tab>シャーレアン工匠街の<var 28 ((EObj)) F61E9B7201 /var>に<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8B3001 /var>を設置
TEXT_HEAVNZ810_01940_TODO_01<tab>イディルシャイアのハーフシクスに報告

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ810_01940_HALFSIX_000_000<tab>Pshkohhh... Is uplander looking to aid Idyllshire? Then uplander has come to right gobbie! Halfsix has tricksy plan, will drive Illuminati out of their braincases!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ810_01940_HALFSIX_000_000<tab>シュコォ……シュコォ……
お前　仕事を　探している？
だったら　ひとつ　頼みたい～！

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ810_01940_HALFSIX_000_001<tab>Psssheehee! Here, take these inventions of Halfsix, name of signalclogger. If uplander puts them up in Makers' Quarter, they will stop all Illuminati airtalking!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ810_01940_HALFSIX_000_001<tab>これは　お手製　「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8B3001 /var>」～！
「青の手」　うろつく　工匠街に　設置して～！
全部で3個　ばっちり　しっかり　設置して～！

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ810_01940_HALFSIX_000_010<tab>Psssheehee! Can uplander imagine Illuminati airtalking while signalclogger is on? “Hello? Hello? Can you hear me?”
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ810_01940_HALFSIX_000_010<tab>これは　お手製　「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8B3001 /var>」～！
「青の手」　うろつく　工匠街に　設置して～！
全部で3個　ばっちり　しっかり　設置して～！

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ810_01940_HALFSIX_000_030<tab>Pshkohhh... Now Illuminati cannot airtalk over linkpearl, must walk all the way from one end of Makers' Quarter all the way to the other to make tongueflaps! Halfsix and uplander have played very good trick, no?
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ810_01940_HALFSIX_000_030<tab>シュコォ……シュコォ……
「青の手」通信　阻害する　装置設置で　嫌がらせ！
いい気味　いたずら　楽しいね～！
